name: SEX Cyber Lust VR
description:
SEX Cyber Lust VR is a PORN virtual reality game that transports players into a magical and futuristic world full of passion and captivating locations. As the main character, the player has two unique methods to visit scenes with SEXY girls.

Method 1: Instant access to scenes:
The player has the option to choose and instantly access any scenes with SEXY girls.
Without the need to search for keys, they can immerse themselves in their preferred scenes and explore their allure.

Method 2: Keys in the backpack:
Alternatively, the player can opt for a more interactive way to unlock scenes.
While still having access to a backpack where they keep the keys, they must actively search for the right color of key that matches the door of a particular scene. Each key works only with a specific type of door, making the exploration and search for the right keys a fascinating aspect of the gameplay.

Player has 4 locations to explore: kawaii planet, forgotten land, spaceship and mushroom planet.

On the scenes with the girls, the player can independently set the positions of lights that highlight their beauty,
and they can use telekinesis to levitate both the girls and various toys.
The game contains about 30 static sex positions (no animations).
The penetration of the girl is done with dildos.

Enjoy sensual experiences and an extraordinary adventure in Cyber Lust VR!!!
